sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent { files: any = null; uploadedFiles: any = null; constructor() {} onFilechange(event: any) { console.log(event.target.files); this.files = event.target.files; } upload() { } }
